detail_desc: Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons at the top.
Boots in grained imitation leather with a zip in one side and a tab over the foot with a metal buckle. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Earrings in various sizes and designs. Length approx. 4-5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Boxy-style T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Briefs in ribbed jersey with a mid waist, wide elastic waistband, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation leather with chunky soles. Lacing at the front, a zip in one side and loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft, windproof functional fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
LIMITED EDITION. Long dress in an airy cotton weave with embroidery, a wrapover front with sewn-in ties at the waist, short sleeves with scalloping at the ends and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide panel at the top, side pockets and fold-down cuffs at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton piqué.
Top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit decorated with plastic beads at the top of the front. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif. Round neckline, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and a concealed press-stud at the neckline and waist. Long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs. Lined skirt.

Sleeveless, calf-length, V-neck dress in a crinkled weave with a concealed zip in one side. Flounce around the neckline that continues along the shoulder straps, a gathered seam under the bust and a diagonal seam across the lower section of the skirt. Lined over the bust.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Block-coloured shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist.

Wide, double-breasted coat in a sturdy, pattern-weave wool blend with large notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a single back vent. Handwarmer pockets and flap welt pockets at the front. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Set of moisturising lip balms. One with a strawberry flavour and one with a watermelon flavour. 2x2.8 g. Not for children under 3, as the packaging contains small parts.
Short, gently flared skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and a high waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front.
Short dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves with ties, a concealed zip in one side and a gently bell-shaped shirt. Unlined.
Top in a double layer of chiffon with narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Made partly from recycled polyester.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Patch front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Cotton jersey lining.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved dress in cotton velvet with a round neck, buttons down the back, and seam with a skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined at the top.
Metal earrings. Length 9.5 cm.
Wide cardigan knitted in a soft alpaca blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Short, straight-cut, V-neck dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Wide butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-on bow at the front and lined gusset.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight, jacquard-weave tunic in a viscose and cotton blend with a glittery thread pattern. High-cut neckline with a grandad collar, opening at the top with a button, short sleeves and a pleat at the back.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam at the hem and wide, woven flounce.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar with smocking that continues over the shoulders, and wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Lined.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in patterned organic slub cotton jersey with buttons at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist with gathers for added width. Unlined.

Metal hair clips in various sizes and designs. Two of the clips are decorated with sparkly plastic beads, one is decorated with pearly plastic beads and two have a tortoiseshell pattern. Length from 6 cm to 8.5 cm.
Chiffon blouse with decorative flounces, a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric with short, flounced sleeves and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke at the front with pin-tucks and lace insets. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Fitted body in jersey with inset lace trims in a narrow cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Pompom trims at the top and concealed press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
Jersey top with dropped shoulders, long, gathered sleeves and gathers in the side seams for a draped effect.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.

Small backpack in soft faux shearling with an embroidered motif and rabbit-ear appliqués at the front. Zip and a handle at the top, and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Width 18 cm. Height 22 cm.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a snap lock and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 9x12x17 cm.

Push-up bras in organic cotton jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short inner tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist with a key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the outer shorts is recycled.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a wrapover front for easier nursing access and lined cups with removable inserts. Elastication at the hem and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Court shoes in soft suede with chisel toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Treggings in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist with a decorative button and fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees.
Thong bodies, one in lace and one in jersey. Adjustable shoulder straps and a lined gusset. Lined at the top.
Trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Dress in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Dress with short raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and a skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Press-studs at the crotch. The cotton content of the dress is partly organic.
Scuba sandals with a relief print, imitation leather straps with adjustable hook and loop fastenings, a heel strap and a loop at the back. Moulded ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Top in soft fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded all-in-one suit in windproof, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams and a detachable lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets, and elastication at the cuffs, hems and back of the waist. Reinforced back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and flap front pockets. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut coat in a stretch weave with notch lapels, a button at the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.

Lightweight popover jacket designed as sportswear in a nylon weave with a high collar and unlined hood with an elastic drawstring. Zip at the top, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and wide microfibre cuffs with thumbholes. Concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 4.5 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a bow at the front and a grosgrain trim around the top. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Straight-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
